markdownContent:
*This is the end of the Feeling the Past topic. Click on the button below to return to the Your Games page. There, under 'Finished Games', you will be able to download your Notebook as a PDF.

Thank you for playing this student-authored storyline of 'Lives in Transit'. If you are interested in using our Marugoto software to author your own content, either for the LiT project or as part of a class assignment, you can learn some basic tips and tricks by playing our Tutorial game (coming shortly). In the meantime, please recommend Lives in Transit to your friends and send us feedback via Twitter.*
